metadata.title: CVE-2021-38425 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
eProsima Fast DDS versions prior to 2.4.0 (#2269) are susceptible toexploitation when an attacker sends a specially crafted packet to flood atarget device with unwanted traffic, which may result in adenial-of-service condition and information exposure.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-38425` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fastdds-tools - 2.5.0+ds-3ubuntu0.1~esm1
libfastrtps2.5 - 2.5.0+ds-3ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: fastdds package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.5.0+ds-3ubuntu0.1~esm1').
